title: I don't understand the point of adding 'GD'
body:
OCE already has a small community and you decide to segregate it more to give the new players who missed out on GD something to brag about? I have been on GD before half of you even installed the game and i can inform you easily that it was a bad mistake to bring it back. Miscellaneous and GD are the exact same thing, why not just rename misc to GD and keep the one section.,

Wtf are you smoking Riot?

replies.body: I haven't been playing too long so I don't really know what GD is, care to explain?
